name: Capitalist Boss
description:
You are the Newest CEO and your Boss is looking to see how well you can do at Making Money.

This game is a "Adventure Capitalist" style game with a little bit of a twist to make it a little more crazy at times.

Your job as the newest CEO is to purchase Robots to work and make money as fast as possible. But beware, your BOSS only gives you so much time before he comes back and checks on you. You don't want to get FIRED!

Watch out for those Need or Greed Cards. They might be able to help you out if your in a bind, but where there is NEED, there is GREED!

While the game is technically completed, as I created this game as a prototype. If there are game breaking bugs or features you would like to see. Then let me know, I may update the game in the future.
